attributes.action: Stop cross border hiring undermining local taxi and phv operators drivers
attributes.background:
Over 20 years experience in the taxi and phv trade and it is now being eroded by the the governments attitude to local taxi and phv firms and drivers livelihoods .

Ludicrous cross border hiring is ruining the taxi and private hire trade

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
